data.name: Absolute Adventure
data.detailed_description:
Absolute Adventure Nulla is a seen from above game with RPG elements and exploration ones, all combined with old style graphics and sound.
It's set in another universe where peace is suddenly threatened by a group of hostile individual whose intentions are unknown.
Fate picks an adventurer as the possible hero of said story, but only with your help said being will be able to fullfil its destiny.
The future that will then take place is shaped by your actions and choices during the course of this loung journey.

data.short_description: Absolute Adventure Nulla is a role playing game set in a different, yet similar, dimension. Its graphics and sound department are inspired by older games of the same genre. Your objective is to guide a wandering adventurer to its destiny: The future you'll forge during the course of the journey!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Intel Core2 Duo Might Not Be Enough When Using A Newer OS.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Early i3 Processors Might Not Be Enough When Using A Newer OS.
